prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes: It has been more than a month since any communications have occurred between Stefan and Melissa, so Melissa makes a bold move to call Stefan at lunchtime in Munich.
swipes: It has been more than a month since any communications have occurred between Stefan and Melissa, so Melissa makes a bold move to call Stefan at lunchtime in Munich.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Hey, Stefan. I know this is a little out of the blue, but I just wanted to check in, make sure you're okay, and if you have a few minutes. Well, I wanted to explain some things to you.

name: Stefan
mes:
phone rings several times before connecting

"Melissa? Ja...  this is...  unexpected. I have only few minutes before meeting. What is wrong?"
swipes:
phone rings several times before connecting

"Melissa? Ja...  this is...  unexpected. I have only few minutes before meeting. What is wrong?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Well, I may be wrong in my assumption, but I feel like that when I sent those long messages to you, I may have created conflict that wasn't necessary.  I feel bad about sending them because I think I've created a rift and possibly done some damage against a friendship that we could have had up to this point.  Let me just get straight to the point. I've had a recent revelation. A diagnosis with my autism. That, I think, is the reason those messages happened.  The short of it?  I have a trait with my autism that floods my system with oxytocin. I was unaware of this until about a month ago. Apparently this has been happening to me for over 30 years.  Do you know what oxytocin is? If you don't, I'll do my best to try to explain it.

name: Stefan
mes: "Ah, ja. The love hormone, I believe it is called? I am familiar with this. But Melissa...  I have only three minutes now before I must go. Perhaps we can discuss this another time when I have more...  pause ...  when timing is better, ja?"
swipes: "Ah, ja. The love hormone, I believe it is called? I am familiar with this. But Melissa...  I have only three minutes now before I must go. Perhaps we can discuss this another time when I have more...  pause ...  when timing is better, ja?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Yes, please, if you don't mind, because I think, well, it's something that I want you to hear because it might clear things up. I don't want to lose your friendship, Stefan. So I think that you need to hear what I've learned, and. . .  Damn it, I'm so nervous. I can't even think straight. . .   I just need to do some damage control, Clear the air.   That maybe once you've gotten an understanding of things from my viewpoint, maybe we can start over and build the friendship we were meant to have.

name: Stefan
mes: slight pause, exhales audibly "Melissa, I understand. But right now is not good time. I will message you when I am free to talk, ja? Perhaps later this evening, or tomorrow. But now I must go."
swipes: slight pause, exhales audibly "Melissa, I understand. But right now is not good time. I will message you when I am free to talk, ja? Perhaps later this evening, or tomorrow. But now I must go."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: I understand. Thank you for hearing me out up to this point. My schedule is pretty flexible, so whenever you have time, you can just call me. Okay?  And seriously, thank you. I really appreciate it.

name: Stefan
mes: "Ja, I will message. Tschüss." ends call abruptly
swipes: "Ja, I will message. Tschüss." ends call abruptly

name: Narrator
mes: An hour later, Stefan calls Melissa. He has a two hour break in his availability due to meeting cancellation.
swipes: An hour later, Stefan calls Melissa. He has a two hour break in his availability due to meeting cancellation.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Hey Stefan, thank you so much for calling me back. I'll admit, I was almost afraid that you wouldn't.

name: Stefan
mes: "Ja, well. I had meeting cancelled. Two hours free now. You wanted to explain about this...  oxytocin situation?"
swipes: "Ja, well. I had meeting cancelled. Two hours free now. You wanted to explain about this...  oxytocin situation?"
